title: So Gameplay is finally starting to get sick of Ziggs.
body:
It's almost

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/HVM9RAJY-i-played-against-a-ziggs-bot-today-and-i-have-no-clue-why-anyone-approves-of-this

As if

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/LOd6qyrh-ziggs-as-adc-highlights-a-few-things

I tried to warn them

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/o7crAQAu-list-of-underrated-mid-laners

That this champion isn't as bad or unreliable as they say

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/5HBZcppE-i-have-been-steamrolling-games-with-ziggs

For months now

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/PiLo1oAK-ive-been-picking-up-steam-with-ziggs-lately-and-i-think-he-has-potential

But gameplay is astoundingly incompetent.
